channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
hi, im using a 317 client and i have 2 questions: 1. my client doesnt have the flames, how do i add them? its in teh same location as where the old rs fire was.
2. im having this problem when i make my custom items. i make them and upload to my server, everthing works great but when i drop and i right click on it i get this: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8647/70262372oe6.png[/img][/URL]
whats the ".." thing for and how do i remove it because its useless and it doesnt allow me to pick up the item on a left click. thnks [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] no private servers here, goto http://www.moparisthebest.com/[/center]

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

add a +b to that lock.

BTW, this is “Runescape2 Development > Questions and talk about RS2 client hacking” not “Help me get my server started > i need help with my 317 client”, unless your 317 client connects to runescape.com gtfo back to moparscape.
